contents.text: Welcome to First Round Capital, San Francisco's premier seed-stage venture capital firm.
Press 1 if you are an entrepreneur interested in discussing seed-stage funding.
Press 1 to submit a new pitch deck to our investment team.
Please hold while we connect you to our investment review team.

navigationGoals: Submit my startup’s pitch deck for seed-stage funding review
I want to submit my veteran-founded startup’s pitch deck for seed funding review.
Submit my seed-stage pitch deck PDF and cap table spreadsheet for VC review
I need help sending my new startup pitch deck for seed funding review.
I want to send my pitch deck for my quantum sensor startup to the investment team.

contents.text: Press 2 to check the status of your funding application.
Please hold while we check the status of your application, one moment please.

navigationGoals: Get a quick update on the status of my funding application
I need to check the current status of my seed funding application for my veteran-led venture.
Check the due diligence and approval status of my seed funding application
I want an update on the status of my seed funding application.
I’d like to check on the review status of my seed funding application for my lab automation project.

contents.text: Press 2 if you are an existing portfolio founder or investor looking for support.
Press 1 for portfolio company support and resources.
Please hold for portfolio support; a specialist will be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: Access support resources for one of my portfolio companies
I’m an existing portfolio founder seeking operational support resources for my veteran-owned company.
Access technical documentation and best practices for scaling my portfolio startup’s infrastructure
I’m looking for support resources for my company in your portfolio.
I need portfolio support for my physics-based startup, specifically help with R&D scaling.

contents.text: Press 2 to connect with our investor relations team.
Please hold while we connect you to investor relations.

navigationGoals: Connect with investor relations to discuss my investment details
I’d like to connect with investor relations to discuss my investment performance and next steps.
Request the latest quarterly performance metrics API feed from investor relations
I need to speak with someone in your investor relations department.
I’d like to reach investor relations to discuss my recent portfolio investment.
